summary: This document is a certification from the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands regarding the incorporation of Jeepers, Inc. It confirms that the Articles of Incorporation were filed and acknowledges the individuals named in those articles as the founding members of the corporation.

persons.name: Lieutenant Governor
persons.context: The Lieutenant Governor certifies the incorporation of Jeepers, Inc. in the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Incorporation of Jeepers, Inc.
events.description: Jeepers, Inc. was officially incorporated in the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: Jeepers, Inc. was filed for incorporation on August 10, 2003.
The document is certified by the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
The certification acknowledges the Articles of Incorporation and the individuals named therein.
